snippet: After Hurricane Sandy, hospitals need to better prepare for even worse storms.
abstract: Editorials contends one lesson of Hurricane Sandy is that New York hospitals are not as well prepared as they need to be for emergencies; calls on hospital administrators to re-examine their evacuation planning and reassess how decisions were made during storm.
lead_paragraph: After Hurricane Sandy, hospitals need to better prepare for even worse storms.
